ht32f5xxxx_ledc.c File Reference

This file provides all the LEDC firmware functions. More...

#include "ht32f5xxxx_ledc.h"

Go to the source code of this file.

Defines

#define RPRE_MASK   0xF000FFFF

Functions

void LEDC_DeInit (void)
 Deinitialize the LEDC peripheral registers to their default reset values.
void LEDC_Init (LEDC_InitTypeDef *LEDC_InitStruct)
 Initialize the LEDC peripheral according to the specified parameters in the LEDC_InitStruct.
void LEDC_ClockSourceConfig (LEDC_SRC_Enum Source)
 Select the LEDC timer clock source.
void LEDC_SetPrescaler (u32 Psc)
 Configure the LEDC prescaler.
void LEDC_Cmd (ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable the LEDC.
void LEDC_IntConfig (ControlStatus NewState)
 Enable or Disable Frame interrupt.
FlagStatus LEDC_GetFlagStatus (void)
 Get the LEDC flag.
void LEDC_ClearFlagStatus (void)
 Clear the LEDC graflag.
void LEDC_COMxConfig (u32 LEDC_COMxEN, ControlStatus Cmd)
 Configure COMx's state of LEDC with specified pins.
void LEDC_SetDeadTimeDuty (u32 LEDC_DeadTimeDuty)
 Configure the dead time duty. The LED brightness can be adjusted by adjusting the dead duty.
void LEDC_SetPolarityMode (u32 LEDC_COMxPOL, u32 LEDC_SEGxPOL, LEDC_Mode mode)
 Set the output polarity of COM and SEG.
